name: Obesity
description:
Obesity is the story of a fatty bird Max. who lives over the top of the floating island. he went down to find the rare blue egg for his love Pavo the peacock but know he is stuck. he can't fly for much time as he is fat and the little floating island get displaced when Max land on them because of his weight.

Help Max to find his love Pavo and to give her the precious blue egg.

Stay fit! Stay healthy!

NOTE - UNIX FILE IS NOTE TESTED TO SOME FEATURE WONT WORK

SO IT IS RECOMMENED TO DOWNLOAD ANDROID OR WINDOWS FILE
